galaxy.summary: This tool is a wrapper for OGC API Processes (OTB) coming from the Zoo Project (https://zoo-project.github.io/docs/intro.html) and was created using the OGC-API-Process2Galaxy tool (https://github.com/AquaINFRA/OGC-API-Process2Galaxy). Check the README in the repository for more information.

related_workflows.name: Workflow: Open Science Persistent Demonstrator Example
